<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rte_eb_script_operation"><sys_rte_eb_script_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><conditional_fields/><conditional_script><![CDATA[/* Example Script
(function(batch, output) {
    for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
        
        // step1: access the input variables
        var a = batch[i].input;

        // step2: your script code goes here
        var b = a + " (Now)";

        // setp3: set the output for each element
        output[i] = b;
    }
})(batch, output);
*/
(function(batch, output) {
    // add your code here
    
})(batch, output);]]></conditional_script><is_conditional>false</is_conditional><name>Script Operation - u_enrollment_u__email_address</name><operation_group/><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[(function(batch, output) {
	for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
		var input = batch[i].input; // Value of the input column. 

    if (input) {
       var table = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
       table.addQuery('email', input); 
       table.query();
       table.next();
       output[i] = table.sys_id;
    }
     
		// Set each output element below
		//output[i] = output_variable_name;
	}
})(batch, output);
]]></script><source_sys_rte_eb_field display_value="u_enrollment_u__email_address">11e7520c07de38105740f96d7c1ed0dc</source_sys_rte_eb_field><source_sys_rte_eb_fields/><sys_class_name>sys_rte_eb_script_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-27 00:17:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c160e1007da78105740f96d7c1ed0ff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Script Operation - u_enrollment_u__email_address</sys_name><sys_package display_value="WS1UEMSpoke" source="x_646971_uemconn_0">860d52f507d430105740f96d7c1ed0b1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_rte_eb_definition display_value="VMware Workspace ONE ITSM Connector">70d7120c07de38105740f96d7c1ed061</sys_rte_eb_definition><sys_rte_eb_entity display_value="temp">78e7520c07de38105740f96d7c1ed075</sys_rte_eb_entity><sys_scope display_value="WS1UEMSpoke">860d52f507d430105740f96d7c1ed0b1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rte_eb_script_operation_8c160e1007da78105740f96d7c1ed0ff</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-27 00:23:48</sys_updated_on><target_sys_rte_eb_field display_value="u_enrollment_u__email_address_1">0c160e1007da78105740f96d7c1ed0fd</target_sys_rte_eb_field><target_sys_rte_eb_fields/><type display_value="Script Operation">941f88e273b333002b6265a751ab9e84</type><use_unique_input_sets>true</use_unique_input_sets></sys_rte_eb_script_operation></record_update>
